text: Federal Route 116, or Jalan Chandekura and Jalan Kedawang, is a major federal road in Langkawi Island, Kedah, Malaysia. ==Features== At most sections, the Federal Route 116 was built under the JKR R5 road standard, allowing maximum speed limit of up to 90 km/h. == List of junctions and town == {|class="wikitable" |- !Km||Exit||Junctions||To||Remarks |- | || || Langkawi Ring Road|| Langkawi Ring Road West Padang Matsirat Langkawi International Airport East Kuah Langkawi Ferry Terminal ||T-junctions |- | || ||Jalan Batu Belah Batu Bertangkup||South Jalan Batu Belah Batu Bertangkup Kampung Bukit Lembu Batu Belah Batu Bertangkup (Split Boulder)||T-junctions |- | || ||Kampung Chandekura|| || |- | || ||Jalan Padang Wahid||North Jalan Padang Wahid Padang Wahid ||T-junctions |- | || ||Jalan Batu Belah Batu Bertangkup||East Jalan Batu Belah Batu Bertangkup Kampung Bukit Lembu Batu Belah Batu Bertangkup (Split Boulder)||T-junctions |- | || ||Kedawang|| || |- | || ||Kedawang|| || |- | || ||Ketapang|| || |- | || ||Jalan Bohor Tempoyak||West Jalan Bohor Tempoyak Bohor Tempoyak Pantai Cenang Underwater World Langkawi||T-junctions |- | || ||Kampung Tanjung|| || |- | || ||Jalan Pantai Tengah||West Jalan Pantai Tengah Pantai Tengah Awana Porto Malai||T-junctions |- | || ||Temoyong|| || |- | || ||Temoyong||East Jalan Bukit Malut Bukit Malut Kedawang Kuah||T-junctions |} ==References== Category:Malaysian Federal Roads
title: Malaysia Federal Route 116
